description: This is a 32-week (1200 hours) segment of the business work-study internship program (WSIP) with an organizational partner approved by NUS Business School. It may be an entire WSIP on its own or form a part of the WSIP.
title: Business Work-Study Internship Programme (32 weeks)
prerequisite:
BBA students should have completed:
• at least 60 MCs of taught modules
• at least one Career Starter Workshops (STR) modules.

BBA(Accountancy) students should have completed:
• ACC2707 Corporate Accounting and Reporting I
• ACC3701 Assurance and Attestation
• ACC3703 Taxation

BSc (Real Estate) students should have completed:
• 100 MCs or 6 semesters of studies

The above pre-requisites may be further tailored according to the design and objectives of each WSIP and/or professional requirements of the organizational partner.
